name: Witchhunter 9000
description:
Witchhunter 9000 is a free endless rouge like for Android. Play as a knight, who has to exterminate all the foul creatures that creep around the world. Accuire cool items to become GODLIKE or chanel the power of your ancestors to achieve a SUPREME LEVEL OF BEING.

Unlock cool LEVEL BACKGROUNDS, SKINS and AURAS.

Download for free. I would be happy if you leave some feedback :)
